.. _Installation:

************
Installation
************

Install Hyperkite on your system is very easy and can be done using a single terminal command on many operating systems. To make sure that all prerequisties (such as Python) are install correctly, we recommend you to first install `Anaconda`_.


Pip Install
===========

Install the Hyperkite package by running the following command in your terminal:

.. code:: bash

    pip install git+git://github.com/hyperkite/hyperkite.git

You should be good to go!

Git Install
===========

The package can also be installed manually, by first cloning the `Git repository`_ and installing from there:

.. code:: bash

    git clone git+https://github.com/hyperkite/hyperkite.git
    cd hyperkite
    python setup.py .


.. _Anaconda: https://www.anaconda.com/
.. _Git repository: https://github.com/hyperkite/hyperkite
